dt-example.title: KeyTable integration
dt-example.info:
If you are looking to emulate the UI of spreadsheet programs such as Excel with DataTables, the combination of [KeyTable](https://datatables.net/extensions/keytable) and AutoFill will take you a long way there!
AutoFill will automatically detect when KeyTable is used on the same table and later its focus option (`af-init autoFill.focus`) so the focused cell will show the auto fill handle. Thus all that needs to be done is to initialise both AutoFill and KeyTable with `af-init autoFill` and `kt-init keys` respectively).
